item.title: Standard ML notes
item.description: Basics Comments (* SML comment *) Variable bindings and Expressions val x = 34; (* static environment: x : int *) (* dynamic environment: x --> 34 *) val y = x + 1; (* Use tilde character instead of minus to reprsent negation *) val z = ~1; (* Integer Division *) val w = y div x Strings:
